value.name: Murder of Professor Robert Sharp by Isom Hamilton investigated on The Murder Tapes
value.description: Robert Sharp invaded the home of Robert Sharp and stabbed him to death. He then tried to cover up his crime by setting a fire.

video.name: Murder of Professor Robert Sharp by Isom Hamilton investigated on The Murder Tapes

value.name: Robert Sharp Murder: Where is Isom Hamilton Now?
value.description: The murder of a retired professor in Ann Arbor, Michigan, in June 2018 had the neighborhood on edge. Robert Sharp was a victim of a burglary and was found dead in his home with a few valuables missing.

value.name: Where is David Sharp Now?
value.description: What’s in the Backpack?’ brings to the viewers the case of Robert Sharp’s murder in Ann Arbor, Michigan. The 76-year-old was found dead in the basement of his home in June 2018 stabbed to death and burned.

value.name: Rare Andean bears spotted at Machu Picchu
value.description: Two Andean bears were spotted earlier this month at Peru's Machu Picchu, taking advantage of the tourist-free ruins by strolling around its slopes, a local official said.

value.name: Stories for January 2019
value.description: Fast-growing Irvine fintech firm Acorns Grow Inc. has raised $105 million in its latest funding round, pushing its valuation to nearly $860 million, tripling its value since 2016, the Wall Street Journal reports.

value.name: Ford aims for 40% of global volume to be all electric
value.description: Ford Motor Co on Wednesday said it aims to have 40% of its global volume be all electric by 2030 in a move to have investors value it more like a technology company. Fred Katayama reports.
